channel.title: HCI – Prof. Mark Perry
channel.description: HCI | IxD | UX | Mobile | Ubicomp | Fintech | Usability

item.title: ACM CHI’15
item.dc:creator: mark perry
item.description: I’ve been asked to act as a sub-committee chair at the CHI 2015 conference in Seoul, South Korea. Rather a long way to go, but should be well worth it for the experience! Conference web link just made available here: http://chi2015.acm.org/
item.content:encoded: I’ve been asked to act as a sub-committee chair at the CHI 2015 conference in Seoul, South Korea. Rather a long way to go, but should be well worth it for the experience! Conference web link just made available here: http://chi2015.acm.org/
